exchange.question: A bit foggy this evening, isn't it?
exchange.answer: Indeed, Neptune himself has covered the sea with his gossamer cloak.

exchange.question: Weird, I thought it was just water vapor?
exchange.answer: Aye, there be much you don't know, har har!

exchange.question: Know any good poems?
exchange.answer: The moon shone pale as bone, as I stood there alone...
